RESOURCE.STRING: EGR Valve / Turbocharger Operational Test
The EGR / Turbocharger Operational test is an automated test that exercises the EGR valve and Variable Geometry Turbocharger to determine if they are operating properly.

EGR valve Test

Instructions:
Test Choices:
Status:
EGR Valve
Turbocharger
All Components
Results:

The EGR Valve Test allows the operator to move the EGR Valve when the engine is not running and the vehicle is not moving. The actuator contains a lightweight return spring. This may or may not cause the EGR valve to return to the open position when the EGR motor is turned off. A high pitched frequency noise can normally be heard when the EGR Valve motor is on.
Help
The Turbocharger Operational Test is an automated test that exercises the Variable Geometry Turbocharger to determine if it is operating properly.
